snippet: Both the federal government and the states need more power to reject price spikes that can’t be justified.
abstract: Editorial contends both federal and state governments need more power to reject unjustifiable health insurance premium increases asked for and acquired by health insurances companies.
lead_paragraph: Both the federal government and the states need more power to reject price spikes that can’t be justified.

headline.seo: Behind Double-Digit Premium Increases for Health Insurance

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
